name: AL-One (Post Jam Update)
description:
Al-One (Post Jam Update)

A 2D platformer where you have to gather 3 diffrent crystals, from 3 different planets to power your ship and fly back home!

Controls:

  • W,S,A,D or Arrow keys for movement.
  • F for jetpack (when unlocked).
  • ESC will respawn the character.
  • Clicking on the [S] in the hand left corner will open the menu (volume sliders, credits, ect).

Production:
Made with Unity 2020.1.5f1 for a games jam over the space of 2 weeks. This is the post jam update version where I have fixed a handful of bugs and implemented some of the user feedback we recieved.

Known Issues:

Tile tearing is still an issue, without editing all of the games sprites to give them small boarders fixing it would be very difficult. I tried using the PixelPerfectCamera Component but it doesn't work very well with CineMachineCameras, both plug-ins are designed for compatabilty if set up correctly, but the Follow target causes the camera to stutter (It's a known issue).

Due to un-fixed jam code it's possible for the player to get stuck inside of the walls, if this happens to you press the escape key to respawn.
